content: mini skein pumpkin double thick fabric ensures your pumpkins can be stuffed firmly for the perkiest of pumpkins these can be hand knit or machine knit one mini skein in sock weight is all you need per pumpkin measurements width 4 ½ 11 5 cm height 3 7 5 cm materials 92 yards 84 meters of fingering / sock weight yarn color a pumpkin body 1 yard of fingering / sock weight yarn color b stem we used cape may fiber mini skein sock 92 yards / 20 gram 75% superwash merino 25% nylon colors shown… top tier crispy leaves and apple tart middle tier fright night and season of the witch bottom tier quartz beach haunted victorian and radium girls for the stem we used color pineland tools - set of 5 us size 6 4 mm dpns or a circular to work the magic loop method - tapestry needle - scissors notions - polyfil stuffing about 24 grams gauge 24 sts 38 rounds / row = 4 in stockinette stitch after blocking adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge notes the pumpkin can be knit on the knitting machine or by hand if by hand you can make the piece in the round versus flat abbreviations bobble= bind off bor= beginning of round co= cast on m= marker pm= place marker round= round sl= slip st= 2 stitch st st= stockinette stitch e g this pattern is copyright 2023 please do not copy reproduce or distribute this pattern without written permission a p http //www ravelry com/designers/vanessa-ewing vanessaewingdesign@gmail com begin by hand knitting color a co 50 sts join in the round being careful not to twist sts place bor marker work in st st for 100 rounds or until you have about 2 yards of yarn leftover bobble all sts do not cut tail proceed to stuffing by machine knitting color a crochet chain co 50 sts leaving an 8 tail for seaming gauge on the smallest setting on a bulky weight knitting machine work 100 row in st st or until have about 2 yards of yarn leftover bind off all sts do not cut tail thread the tapestry needle with the 8 long tail and seam the side seams together using mattress stitch method proceed to stuffing stuffing watch this sped-up video to give you a visual idea of how the pumpkin comes together https //www instagram com/p/cwbsvwfgjkj/ fold the piece in half wrong sides facing eachother so that bobble and co sts are aligned together your fabric will now be double thick thread tapestry needle with the very long tail and weave in and out between 2 layers of knit stitch along the co and bobble edges keep stitching around tightening as you go and pushing the co/bobble edge of the fabric towards the inside of
